reviewText: Not very good lots of older hentai porn that has crappy voice acting Only a few newer scenes and is just a patch job of a bunch of different shows

This wasn't even a movie. It had no story line, they just flashed pieces of past shows for about 3 seconds a piece. Do your self a favor don't buy it. It was so bad and I was so disappointed that I mailed it back to the company

I really didn't like this movie; it hints and rape and borders close to pedo in that there are a few characters that look like little girls instead of consenting adults... then again it's called taboo so... I just didn't like it.

The items condition was as the seller had said and the shipping was impeccable,with that said. Taboo was horrible, no story lines and not right. I purchased this item not knowing the meaning of "taboo" so it was my own fault for not doing my research, in other words there is rape, insest, and other things I do not agree with. Thanks for reading.

I was disappointed with the dvd it was a clip show of about six or seven clips with no story line at all.
Also a some pictures from the clips as a another feature . I though it could off been done better.

I received this item and was pleased from the moment I saw it. It is great quality and the pictures on Amazon don't do it justice. You will be pleased you purchased this item and I will definately recommend this to my friends!
